title: Software Developer (Full-stack)
description: Work as part of a scrum team to deliver new features and maintain both the front-end and back-end of Uberflip's main product
Plan, Prototype, and Develop modern Node.js based web applications and services (Express, Typescript, etc)
Develop new features and products using React, Web Components, and/or Vanilla Javascript
Develop and maintain both internal and external Larevel and CakePHP based APIs
Modernize a PHP-template and jQuery based application to an API powered React application
Convert existing enterprise scale web application's build process from Gulp to Webpack, implementing code-splitting, babel, bundling, and other modern build features.
Write migration scripts for both MySQL and MongoDB databases
Write and maintain TestNG (Java) Acceptance Tests, and Jest (Javascript and Typescript) unit tests

title: Front-End Developer
description: Develop custom in house framework for custom front-end work ontop of the Uberflip platform
Develop, implement, and maintain Webpack based build process for the front-end team
Create tools to increase efficientcy of front-end team's work, reduce wait times for clients
Introduce code style guide, linting, and modern JavaScript to front-end team
Use CSS/Sass, JavaScript, and jQuery to build customizations and integrations

title: Front-End Developer (Customer Success)
description: Use CSS/Sass, JavaScript, and jQuery to build customizations and integrations
Translate client mock-ups into pixel perfect web experiences
Provid an expert opinion for clients on best practices with the Uberflip platform and web development
Provide technical expertise to client facing teams and provide project estimations

title: Lead JavaScript Mentor
description: Work with lead instructor to help students develop an understanding of the JavaScript language, its features, and its history.
Provided additional resources and one-on-one mentorship outside of lecture
Write documents to provide to students that support their learning
Provide scope evaluation and guidance on student project proposals
Evaluate and give feedback on student projects

title: Fullstack Mentor
description: Work with lead instructor to help students develop an understanding of fullstack web development, utilizing the technologies MongoDB, Mongoose ORM, NodeJs, Express.js, and React
Provided additional resources and one-on-one mentorship outside of lecture

title: Web Application Developer (Freelance / Casual)
description: Independently design, develop, and maintain interal application for shelter management using React, MongoDB, NodeJS, and Express.js
Manage server aquisition, deployment, and maintence
Implement feature requests from staff to expand application functionality, building with future extensibility as a priority
Create versitile reporting functionality to display data in an accurate and visually appealing way
Set up and maintain error logging and monitoring services to ensure application stability
